TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(object sender, SourceChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SourceChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SourceChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SourceChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SourceChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type SourceChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SourceChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 引发事件以及事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将对特定侦听器元素处理“SourceChanged”事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托表示的处理程序的"SourceChanged"事件未公开为公共[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，这与大多数路由事件的情况相同。The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events. 相反，"SourceChanged"是保留专用于路由的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构，并直接路由。Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed. 它是直接路由，因为`sender`和在事件数据始终是相同的对象。Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the in the event data are always the same object. 您可以添加和删除对此尽管事件本身的私有访问级别的事件处理程序使用的公共方法和。You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods and . `sender`事件将为派生的类的。The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of .
